alert.note: Alert for Boone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 2:14AM CDT until July 19 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR BOONE COUNTY... At 213 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbia, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Ashland, Columbia Regional Airport, Rocheport, Murry, Midway, Lupus, and McBaine. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Finger Lakes State Park, and Jewell Cemetery Historic Site. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 115 and 133. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
